    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114612</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elastic behaviour of rubber</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elastisches Verhalten des Gummis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comportement élastique du caoutchouc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comportamento elástico da borracha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comportamento elastico di gomma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαστική συμπεριφορά του λάστιχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comportamiento elástico del caucho</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the behaviour of the molecular chains of an elastic rubber. Under tensile stress, the chains partially uncoil, untwist and straighten out. When the stress is removed, the chains return to their original highly coiled conformation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elasticity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular chain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tensile stress</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verhalten der 
molekularen Ketten eines elastischen Gummis. Unter dehnbarem 
Druck wickelen sich die Ketten teilweise ab, lösen und richten heraus
gerade. Wenn der Druck gelöscht wird, gehen die Ketten zu ihrer
Vorlage in hohem Grade umwickelten Anpassung zurück.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le comportement des 
chaînes moléculaires d'un caoutchouc élastique. Sous l'effort
de tension, les chaînes partiellement déroulent, détordent et se 
redressent dehors. Quand l'effort est retiré, les chaînes 
reviennent à leur conformation fortement lovée d'original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o comportamento das 
correntes molecular de uma borracha elástica. Sob o stress 
tensile, as correntes parcialmente desenrolam-se, destorcem-se e 
endireitam-se para fora. Quando o stress é removido, as 
correntes retornam a seu conformation altamente bobinado do original.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il comportamento 
delle catene molecolari di una gomma elastica. Sotto lo sforzo 
di tensione, le catene parzialmente strotolano, distsono e raddrizzano
fuori. Quando lo sforzo è rimosso, le catene ritornano alla 
loro conformazione altamente arrotolata di originale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη συμπεριφορά των 
μοριακών αλυσίδων ενός ελαστικού λάστιχου. Κάτω από την 
εκτατή πίεση, οι αλυσίδες ξετυλίγουν μερικώς, untwist και 
ισιώνουν έξω. Όταν η πίεση αφαιρείται, οι αλυσίδες 
επιστρέφουν στην αρχική ιδιαίτερα κουλουριασμένη διαμόρφωσή 
τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el comportamiento de 
los encadenamientos moleculares de un caucho elástico. Bajo 
tensión extensible, los encadenamientos desenrollan, desenroscan y se
enderezan parcialmente hacia fuera. Cuando se quita la tensión,
los encadenamientos vuelven a su conformación altamente arrollada de 
la original.</string>
          </description>
